name: MultiScale Probability Map guided Index Pooling with Attention-based learning for Road and Building Segmentation
description:
A HR-Net based attention guided deep learning model with index pooling based downsampling operation for road and building image segmentation. 
 Published in: ISPRS Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing

name: Dense Dilated Deep Multiscale Supervised U-Network for biomedical image segmentation
description: An U-Net based deep learning model for biomedical image segmentation. Published in: Computers in Biology Medicine.

name: Dense Dilated Multi-Scale Supervised Attention-Guided Network for histopathology image segmentation
description:
An U-Net based attention guided deep learning model for histopathology image segmentation. 
 Published in: Computers in Biology Medicine.

name: Performance analysis and optimization of a hybrid tsr-psr protocol for af, df and hybrid afâ€“df relaying under weibull fading
description:
Proposed and optimized a hybrid TSR-PSR protocol for af, df and hybrid AF-DF relaying communication network. 
 Published in: Telecommunication Systems.

name: Decoding the creative ability of subjects from aesthetic quality assessment using dual convolution induced capsule networ
description:
A dual convolution based deep learning network for EEG signal classification. 
 Published in: SSCI Conference.

name: An area efficient vlsi architecture for 1-d and 2-d discrete wavelet transform (dwt) and inverse discrete wavelet transform (idwt)
description:
A VLSI architecture for 1-D and 2-D DWT and IDWT implemented in FPGA board. 
 Published in: DevIC Conference.

name: A cost-effective tracking and health monitoring system for suspected covid-19 patient in quarantine
description:
An arduino based health monitoring system cure patients designed for COVID-19 pandemic. 
 Published in: Micro Conference.

name: An android-application-controlled car for human safety against covid-19
description:
An arduino based application controlled car system designed for COVID-19 pandemic. 
 Published in: ICIA Conference.
